campaign against the Japan-US Security Treaty (1959-60, 1970)

r_ele.r: かいじょうほあんちょう

sense.gloss: living in peace, living a quiet life
being content with one's present position, being satisfied with one's lot

sound sleep, good sleep, quiet sleep
obtaining peace of mind through faith or ascetic practice
safe area (where the player is safe from enemy attacks), safe zone
maximum allowable single-day loss (stock exchange, etc.)
mere consolation, temporary peace of mind

sdata.j: ↑自由↑↓じゆう↓とは、できるだけ↑安全↑↓あんぜん↓にあらゆることが↑行↑↓おこな↓える↑状態↑↓じょうたい↓のことを↑言↑↓い↓う。
sdata.e: Liberty consists of being able to make everything as harmless as possible.
